	<div style='position:absolute;  z-index:2000;' id='recsure_geeklist224225'></div></div>
			I try to make one of these every year.<br /><br />This is really a snapshot in time. The highest ranked games rarely change.  The others may go up and down based on how I recently I played them.  There are games I like a lot that aren't on here because they haven't been on the table for awhile or I need to explore them more deeply.<br /><br />Probably no surprise, but the majority of my gaming is solo wargaming.  I also play Euros and fillers with the family and Ameritrash with a buddy in town.<br /><br />Solitaire-only games rated more highly than normal because I just come off of my periodic <a href="https://www.boardgamegeek.com/geeklist/232121/barteus-con-2017-convention-rest-us" target="_blank" class="postlink" rel="nofollow">30 solitaire games in 30 days challenge (Barteus Con)</a>.<br /><br />I also have an ongoing <a href="https://www.boardgamegeek.com/geeklist/226870/my-personal-top-10s" target="_blank" class="postlink" rel="nofollow">Top 10 lists</a> of various categories that I am always adding on to as I play through more of my collection and re-visit it.<br /><br />Comments are welcome. <br /><br /><div ><a href="/image/3290935"><img src="https://cf.geekdo-images.com/images/pic3290935_md.png" onload="ImageResizer.resize(this);"></a></div>

		   	src="https://cf.geekdo-static.com/tmpbadgeimage/badge_a0bbe6a64ae2facaa04e4ea12a128d40.png"></a>
	</div>
		
						<div class='dn js-avatarovertext'>&quot;Just get that sucka to the designated place at the designated time and I will gladly designate his ass...for dismemberment!&quot; - Sho Nuff.</div>
				<div><a href="/user/airjudden"><img
				class='js-overtext' 
				data-overtexttype='avatarovertext'
				width="64" 
				height="64"
				src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="
				onload="lzld(this)"
				onerror="lzld(this)"
				data-frz-src="https://cf.geekdo-static.com/avatars/avatar_id107791.png"
				alt="Avatar"></a>
		</div>
	
		
			<div class='badgeyears'>
	<a href="/support"  class='js_badgelink'
		onmouseover="GAV_ShowBadge( this ); return overlib( 'This user supports the website - Click for more info.', WRAP );"
		onmouseout="return nd();">
	<span class='oddicon patron'></span><span class='oddicon year_10_band band' data-year='10'></span><span class='oddicon year_11_band band' data-year='11'></span><span class='oddicon year_12_band band' data-year='12'></span><span class='oddicon year_13_band band' data-year='13'></span><span class='oddicon year_14_num num last' data-year='14'></span>	</a>
</div>
		
	<div ><a href="/microbadge/1224"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Kansas State University', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_1224_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/14733"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Washington\&#039;s War fan ', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_14733_1.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/38935"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('&quot;I am not throwing away my shot!&quot;', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_38935_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/29834"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Mark Herman fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_29834_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/32496"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Michael Rinella Fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_32496_0.png"></a></div>
</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#100</span><br /><br />This is an exceptional solitaire game with a strong space theme.  It is something of an homage to the old classic <a  href="/boardgame/5206/ogre"   >Ogre</a>, except this is way better than Ogre.  It offers plenty of scenarios and units on both sides for replayability, along with a deck of cards that define movement and firing priority, so that it is very difficult to predict the movement of the artificial intelligence.  Smart design by one of the few designers out there whose name pretty much makes a game an insta-buy for me.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #87</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>
		</dl>
		<dl>
							<dd class="doubleleft">
									<div id='recommendstatus_listitem5334565'>
	<dl class="recommend">
			<dt class='recs'><a href="/login">8</a>&nbsp;</dt>
	<dd class='thumbdd'><a href="/login">&nbsp;<img class="icon " src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" alt="Thumb up" title="Thumb up"></a></dd>

			<dt class='tippers'><a href="/login" style='color: #969600;'></a></dt>
	<dd><a href="/login">&nbsp;<img class='icon i_coinsmall2' title='GeekGold Tip' alt='tip' style=''  src='data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==' /></a></dd>

				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',

											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>

			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',

				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>

			</span>

		</div>

		</div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"

				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">

							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>

						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#99</span><br /><br />A golden oldie from the early 1980s that remains the gold standard for helicopter logistical fun. That sounds like an oxymoron, but it's not. You have to experience it.  Loads of fun and bluffing in this fairly complex pocket game.  Fortunately, I created a flowchart (in the BGG Files section of this game) to simplify it.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #92</b>

									<div id='recommendstatus_listitem5334558'>
	<dl class="recommend">
			<dt class='recs'><a href="/login">2</a>&nbsp;</dt>

								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',

				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>

			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"

				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"

					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',

				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;

					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">

							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			</span>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#98</span><br /><br />A really great Ameritrash chess-like game with various factions that are asymmetrical.  The decisions are tough when it comes to allocating your cards and trying to save enough to get a champion. I need to play the phone app and get more experience with this. It has been awhile since Aaron and I have played.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #86</b>

									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#97</span><br /><br />I'm a communist for saying this, but I prefer this to <a  href="/boardgame/15987/arkham-horror"   >Arkham Horror</a>.  I guess I prefer colonial America over dreamscapes (is that what they call those weird things(?) and Cthulhu. This one plays well and expands nicely. I also like that when the boss awakes, it doesn't necessarily spell your doom, even if he clobbers you, you have a chance to mend and fight again.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #84</b>

				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">

		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">

					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="comment_toolbar" ng-show="showpager||numnextitems_calculated">
			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numnextitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',
					        'other': '{} additional comments'}">

			</span>

			<span class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('next')">View More Comments {{limitCount(numnextitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}&nbsp;/&nbsp;{{numnextitems_calculated}}</span>

			<span class="fr"
				  ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}

	<div ><a href="/microbadge/1224"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Kansas State University', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_1224_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/14733"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Washington\&#039;s War fan ', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_14733_1.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/38935"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('&quot;I am not throwing away my shot!&quot;', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_38935_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/29834"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Mark Herman fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_29834_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/32496"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Michael Rinella Fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_32496_0.png"></a></div>
</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#94</span><br /><br />Nice filler game to play with 2 or more. My kids like this game a lot, also.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #85</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>
		</dl>
		<dl>

		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">

								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>

			</div>
		</div>

	<span class='oddicon patron'></span><span class='oddicon year_10_band band' data-year='10'></span><span class='oddicon year_11_band band' data-year='11'></span><span class='oddicon year_12_band band' data-year='12'></span><span class='oddicon year_13_band band' data-year='13'></span><span class='oddicon year_14_num num last' data-year='14'></span>	</a>

	<div ><a href="/microbadge/1224"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Kansas State University', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_1224_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/14733"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Washington\&#039;s War fan ', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_14733_1.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/38935"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('&quot;I am not throwing away my shot!&quot;', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_38935_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/29834"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Mark Herman fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_29834_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/32496"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Michael Rinella Fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_32496_0.png"></a></div>
</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#93</span><br /><br />A very solid State of Siege game and the only one I win more than I lose. This one was designed by the guy who created the system.  This covers the declining Ottoman Empire in WWI yet shows how the rest of the war effected them. If things are going badly for Germany, it affects you.<br /><br />Besides fronts advancing toward the middle, this offers a "National Will" as another way to the lose the game and offers "pay 2 actions now, get a bonus action later" investment. It also offers markers that represent combat in off-map areas (Eastern and Western fronts) that would affect this one. The "Running the Straits" mechanic is the greatest part of the game, though, as you spend action to build up your defenses to prevent the British from taking you out in a single decisive blow.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #74</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>
		</dl>

						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#92</span><br /><br />Rob introduced me to this back in 2012.  I traded for a copy in 2016, introduced it to the family this year and they loved it.  It became our most played family game of the year.  I don't know how the board game plays but this is a fun one when you've got about 20 minutes. You draw cards, and collect pieces of treasures, and sell them to the museum for exponentially more money for each part you have. You press your luck by trying to get the parts built up to sell before a sandstorm hits and takes away half of your cards or an opponent's thief steals a valuable part.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: Not Ranked</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>

	  data-ng-init='init({"objecttype":"listitem","objectid":5334682,"disallowcomments":false,"showcount":50,"commentid":0,"showeditcontrols":0,"showadmincontrols":0,"showdeletecontrols":0,"viewdate":false,"events":[],"hidecomments":false,"numitems":"0","endpage":0,"direction":"previous","inclusive":true,"showmore":true}, {&quot;config&quot;:{&quot;locked&quot;:0,&quot;objectlink&quot;:&quot;&lt;a  href=\&quot;\/boardgame\/31105\/archaeology-card-game\&quot;   &gt;Archaeology: The Card Game&lt;\/a&gt; &amp;raquo; &lt;a  href=\&quot;\/geeklist\/224225\/item\/5334682#item5334682\&quot;   &gt;Item for Geeklist \&quot;Airjudden&#039;s Top 100: 2017\&quot; &lt;\/a&gt;&quot;,&quot;current_userid&quot;:null,&quot;numitems&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;numprevitems&quot;:0},&quot;comments&quot;:[]})'>
	
		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>

								</span>

									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]

							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">

				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">

							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>

									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#90</span><br /><br />A crazy-tough game to beat, but you start off thinking you actually have a chance! This stands out as one of the stronger offerings when it comes to marrying the mechanics to the history. I think it has to do with the ABDA/Submarines/Oil system along with the general hedgehog strategy one uses in this game.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #67</b>

		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>

	<div ><a href="/microbadge/1224"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Kansas State University', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_1224_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/14733"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Washington\&#039;s War fan ', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_14733_1.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/38935"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('&quot;I am not throwing away my shot!&quot;', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_38935_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/29834"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Mark Herman fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_29834_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/32496"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Michael Rinella Fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_32496_0.png"></a></div>
</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#87</span><br /><br />More press your luck mayhem, but this time involving monsters. This is a family favorite. The New York version is probably the better game, but I own this one and this is what I play with the family.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #77</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>

								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="comment_toolbar" ng-show="showpager||numnextitems_calculated">
			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numnextitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',
					        'other': '{} additional comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('next')">View More Comments {{limitCount(numnextitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}&nbsp;/&nbsp;{{numnextitems_calculated}}</span>

			<span class="fr"
				  ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>
			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#86</span><br /><br />A light <a  href="/boardgame/586/front"   >Up Front</a>-like card game by the same designer as Up Front.  Fun game that doubles as a wargame filler.  And I love saying, "One ping only" in my best Sean Connery accent.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: Not Ranked</b>

I have 3 games under my belt, but I dunno...&lt;br \/&gt;&lt;br \/&gt;And I have the original game and both expansions.  Go figure.&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;br \/&gt;&lt;br \/&gt;You mentioned in one of the HAMTAG videos that you didn&#039;t like the lack of control due to a bad hand in &lt;a  href=\&quot;\/boardgame\/21050\/combat-commander-europe\&quot;   &gt;Combat Commander: Europe&lt;\/a&gt;, and that definitely also happens in &lt;a  href=\&quot;\/boardgame\/586\/front\&quot;   &gt;Up Front&lt;\/a&gt; and here, but this game is much simpler  and as a filler you probably find that situation more tolerable. I find that situation though to be one which adds to the fog of war in &lt;a  href=\&quot;\/boardgame\/586\/front\&quot;   &gt;Up Front&lt;\/a&gt; and thus advancing forward is much more nail biting due to abstraction of having no map (ie you know the enemy is out there, but you do not know exactly where). Give the game more tries it might grow on you. 		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>

					</dd>

					<dd class="left">

							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">

								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>

			</div>
		</div>

				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"

					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',

							<dd class="left" style="clear:none;"><div class='avatarblock js-avatar divcenter' data-userid='189519' data-username='airjudden' data-urlusername='airjudden'> 
	<div>Judd Vance</div>
	<div class='username'>(<a href="/user/airjudden">airjudden</a>)</div>

						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#84</span><br /><br />An original idea: you are trying to MAINTAIN your galactic empire from threats of rebellion, usurpers, and general unrest.  It makes you wish you had a death star!<br /><br />Great solitaire engine with many tough decisions.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: Not Ranked</b>

			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>

			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',

				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			</span>

			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"

				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">

							</li>

							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">

						</ul>

						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#83</span><br /><br />A game that captures large swaths of Gettysburg history in a fairly simple set of mechanics. It reminds me of a mixture of Jim Dunnigan and Mark Simonitch. The designer hit a huge home run on a topic that is well-represented in wargaming.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: Not Ranked</b>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>

				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

		</div>

			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">

								</span>

							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>

										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>

										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>

						</ul>

						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#81</span><br /><br />A light Napoleonic game covering 4 battles, each with its own map, counters, and cards. It uses a clever morale track, where it becomes your currency and you spend it for force marches and combat advantages, but if it goes to zero, you lose.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: Not Ranked</b>

	<span class='oddicon patron'></span><span class='oddicon year_10_band band' data-year='10'></span><span class='oddicon year_11_band band' data-year='11'></span><span class='oddicon year_12_band band' data-year='12'></span><span class='oddicon year_13_band band' data-year='13'></span><span class='oddicon year_14_num num last' data-year='14'></span>	</a>
</div>
		
	<div ><a href="/microbadge/1224"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Kansas State University', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_1224_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/14733"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Washington\&#039;s War fan ', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_14733_1.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/38935"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('&quot;I am not throwing away my shot!&quot;', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_38935_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/29834"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Mark Herman fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_29834_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/32496"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Michael Rinella Fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_32496_0.png"></a></div>
</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#80</span><br /><br />A Jim Dunnigan classic from 1973 that cleverly captures the unique fighting conditions and supply problems in North Africa without an overly-complicated set of rules.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: Not Ranked</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>

									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="comment_toolbar" ng-show="showpager||numnextitems_calculated">
			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numnextitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',
					        'other': '{} additional comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('next')">View More Comments {{limitCount(numnextitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}&nbsp;/&nbsp;{{numnextitems_calculated}}</span>

			<span class="fr"
				  ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>
			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>
	
</div>

		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="comment_toolbar" ng-show="showpager||numnextitems_calculated">
			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numnextitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',
					        'other': '{} additional comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('next')">View More Comments {{limitCount(numnextitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}&nbsp;/&nbsp;{{numnextitems_calculated}}</span>

			<span class="fr"
				  ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>
			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>
	
</div>

	</div>

						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#78</span><br /><br />A gorgeous game (Don Troiani does that!) with innovative combat and pretty tight balance (can be adjusted to suit your skills) and good card assisted mechanic. Tough to pull off French & Indian war games, but this one does it.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #33</b>

			<td><a class='js-showavatarmenu' href="javascript://"><img class='icon i_avatarmenu js-icon-mouseover' title='' alt='tools' style='' data-iconclass='i_avatarmenu' data-iconmouseoverclass='i_avatarmenu_over' src='data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==' /></a>
			</td>
		</tr>
		</table>
		<span class='js-avatarmenu' style='position:absolute; z-index:300;'></span>
	</div>
			
	
		
		
	
		
			
	
		<div>
					<div class='dn js-badgeovertext'>Every Man a (K-State) Wildcat!</div>
			   <a href="/user/airjudden"><img alt='badge' title=''
				class="supergeekbadge js-overtext"
		   	data-overtexttype = 'badgeovertext'
		   	src="https://cf.geekdo-static.com/tmpbadgeimage/badge_a0bbe6a64ae2facaa04e4ea12a128d40.png"></a>
	</div>
		
						<div class='dn js-avatarovertext'>&quot;Just get that sucka to the designated place at the designated time and I will gladly designate his ass...for dismemberment!&quot; - Sho Nuff.</div>

			<div class='badgeyears'>
	<a href="/support"  class='js_badgelink'
		onmouseover="GAV_ShowBadge( this ); return overlib( 'This user supports the website - Click for more info.', WRAP );"

	<span class='oddicon patron'></span><span class='oddicon year_10_band band' data-year='10'></span><span class='oddicon year_11_band band' data-year='11'></span><span class='oddicon year_12_band band' data-year='12'></span><span class='oddicon year_13_band band' data-year='13'></span><span class='oddicon year_14_num num last' data-year='14'></span>	</a>
</div>
		
	<div ><a href="/microbadge/1224"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Kansas State University', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_1224_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/14733"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Washington\&#039;s War fan ', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_14733_1.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/38935"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('&quot;I am not throwing away my shot!&quot;', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_38935_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/29834"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Mark Herman fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_29834_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/32496"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Michael Rinella Fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_32496_0.png"></a></div>
</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#77</span><br /><br />This is a vote for the entire system. The base game alone doesn't make my top 100.  However, the various fronts, airplane expansion, map variants (Breakthrough & Overlord) and the campaign books add a lot to this system.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #55</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>

			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',

				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>

			</span>

		</div>

			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>

					</dd>

								</span>

							</li>

								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>

							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
