		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="comment_toolbar" ng-show="showpager||numnextitems_calculated">
			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numnextitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',
					        'other': '{} additional comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('next')">View More Comments {{limitCount(numnextitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}&nbsp;/&nbsp;{{numnextitems_calculated}}</span>

			<span class="fr"
				  ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>
			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>
	
</div>

	</div>

		</div>

		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="comment_toolbar" ng-show="showpager||numnextitems_calculated">
			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numnextitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',
					        'other': '{} additional comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('next')">View More Comments {{limitCount(numnextitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}&nbsp;/&nbsp;{{numnextitems_calculated}}</span>

			<span class="fr"
				  ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>
			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

	<div style='position:absolute;  z-index:2000;' id='recsure_geeklist224225'></div></div>
			I try to make one of these every year.<br /><br />This is really a snapshot in time. The highest ranked games rarely change.  The others may go up and down based on how I recently I played them.  There are games I like a lot that aren't on here because they haven't been on the table for awhile or I need to explore them more deeply.<br /><br />Probably no surprise, but the majority of my gaming is solo wargaming.  I also play Euros and fillers with the family and Ameritrash with a buddy in town.<br /><br />Solitaire-only games rated more highly than normal because I just come off of my periodic <a href="https://www.boardgamegeek.com/geeklist/232121/barteus-con-2017-convention-rest-us" target="_blank" class="postlink" rel="nofollow">30 solitaire games in 30 days challenge (Barteus Con)</a>.<br /><br />I also have an ongoing <a href="https://www.boardgamegeek.com/geeklist/226870/my-personal-top-10s" target="_blank" class="postlink" rel="nofollow">Top 10 lists</a> of various categories that I am always adding on to as I play through more of my collection and re-visit it.<br /><br />Comments are welcome. <br /><br /><div ><a href="/image/3290935"><img src="https://cf.geekdo-images.com/images/pic3290935_md.png" onload="ImageResizer.resize(this);"></a></div>

					<div class='fl'>
													<a href="/geeklist/224225/item/5678949#item5678949" name="item5678949">51.</a>
						
																					Board Game: <a  href="/boardgame/1662/napoleon-waterloo-campaign-1815"   >Napoleon: The Waterloo Campaign, 1815</a>
													
													<span class='sf' style='font-weight:normal;'>[Average Rating:7.34 Overall Rank:<a href="/browse/boardgame?rank=985#985">985</a>]</span>
						
											</div>

	<div ><a href="/microbadge/1224"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Kansas State University', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_1224_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/14733"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Washington\&#039;s War fan ', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_14733_1.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/38935"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('&quot;I am not throwing away my shot!&quot;', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_38935_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/29834"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Mark Herman fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_29834_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/32496"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Michael Rinella Fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_32496_0.png"></a></div>
</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#50</span><br /><br />A golden oldie that got a much needed face lift.  The Avalon Hill edition felt like it needed more blocks.  The Columbia 3rd edition felt like it had too many.  This one feels juuuuust right.  I love the new terrain blocks in this edition, even though I prefer the Avalon Hill combat system.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: Not Ranked</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>

								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',

											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>

			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>

				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">

							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"

							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>

										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>

						</ul>

						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#49</span><br /><br />The best game in the <a  href="/boardgamefamily/54/battles-american-revolution"   >Battles of the American Revolution</a> series.  The Command & Control Breakdown tables create enough chaos to provide a lot of replayability.  Someday, I want to play a "What if" scenario where Washington puts Greene in charge of the battle (and remove C&C breakdown) just to see what would happen.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: Not Ranked</b>

						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#47</span><br /><br />This is another tight Mike Rinella design in a simple package.  The Americans have the force and resource advantage, but the clock and terrain is on Japan's side.  It is tricky to balance the use of your resources and the sunset die roll can screw with your best laid plans.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #49</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>

				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">

							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>

										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>

		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="comment_toolbar" ng-show="showpager||numnextitems_calculated">
			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numnextitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 additional comment',
					        'other': '{} additional comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('next')">View More Comments {{limitCount(numnextitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}&nbsp;/&nbsp;{{numnextitems_calculated}}</span>

			<span class="fr"
				  ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>

	<div ><a href="/microbadge/1224"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Kansas State University', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_1224_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/14733"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Washington\&#039;s War fan ', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_14733_1.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/38935"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('&quot;I am not throwing away my shot!&quot;', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_38935_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/29834"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Mark Herman fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_29834_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/32496"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Michael Rinella Fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_32496_0.png"></a></div>
</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#43</span><br /><br />I have over 4,000 plays in the last 18 months (all but 1 on the phone). I just can't get enough of it. The core principles of deck building are alive and well in this game and despite the plays, I always marvel at how well balanced the cards are in terms of powers and cost.  (Note: avoid the expansions except the one that introduces bases and cards that cost 6 or less).<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #31</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>
		</dl>
		<dl>
							<dd class="doubleleft">
									<div id='recommendstatus_listitem5334642'>
	<dl class="recommend">
			<dt class='recs'><a href="/login">15</a>&nbsp;</dt>
	<dd class='thumbdd'><a href="/login">&nbsp;<img class="icon " src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" alt="Thumb up" title="Thumb up"></a></dd>

			<dt class='tippers'><a href="/login" style='color: #969600;'>0.01</a></dt>
	<dd><a href="/login">&nbsp;<img class='icon i_coinsmall2' title='GeekGold Tip' alt='tip' style=''  src='data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==' /></a></dd>

	</dl>

	<div ><a href="/microbadge/1224"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Kansas State University', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_1224_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/14733"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Washington\&#039;s War fan ', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_14733_1.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/38935"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('&quot;I am not throwing away my shot!&quot;', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_38935_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/29834"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Mark Herman fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_29834_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/32496"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Michael Rinella Fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_32496_0.png"></a></div>
</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#42</span><br /><br />I really got into this game this year through work I did on the Vassal module. The game has really smooth mechanics and isn't nearly as complicated as folks think. You can play 4 sequential scenarios covering the initial push south, Inch'on and the push north, the Chinese counter-attack, and Ridgeway's push north.  The rest of the war was a stalemate and that is not covered. These are easy and use about 16 pages of rules.  Or you can play a big scenario that combines the time frame from all of the scenarios together and adds in extra rules, such as nuclear weapons and Soviet intervention. This adds a lot of tables on the maps and that is what scares people. Seriously, play the scenarios and it's easy.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: Not Ranked</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>
		</dl>

	  data-ng-init='init({"objecttype":"listitem","objectid":5334683,"disallowcomments":false,"showcount":50,"commentid":0,"showeditcontrols":0,"showadmincontrols":0,"showdeletecontrols":0,"viewdate":false,"events":[],"hidecomments":false,"numitems":"0","endpage":0,"direction":"previous","inclusive":true,"showmore":true}, {&quot;config&quot;:{&quot;locked&quot;:0,&quot;objectlink&quot;:&quot;&lt;a  href=\&quot;\/boardgame\/7349\/korean-war\&quot;   &gt;The Korean War&lt;\/a&gt; &amp;raquo; &lt;a  href=\&quot;\/geeklist\/224225\/item\/5334683#item5334683\&quot;   &gt;Item for Geeklist \&quot;Airjudden&#039;s Top 100: 2017\&quot; &lt;\/a&gt;&quot;,&quot;current_userid&quot;:null,&quot;numitems&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;numprevitems&quot;:0},&quot;comments&quot;:[]})'>
	
		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">

							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>

						</ul>

		</div>

I have played all 30 scenarios and many of them multiple times (ex: Pickett's Charge 3 times).<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #34</b>

				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>

			</a>

</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#39</span><br /><br />I have said it before: it is tough to pull off a well-designed French & Indian War game due to the asymmetrical nature of the sides.  This does about as good of a job as any and it bring French & Indian raiding parties to the forefront and makes the British player focus on supporting the frontier and gives you the experience of moving slowly and deliberately toward your destination as well as capturing a lot of historical flavor in the event cards.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #28</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>

						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#38</span><br /><br />The best historical State of Siege game: the convoy system is exceptional and the Ultra mechanic is quite fun. You don't see many games on this: making Malta the centerpiece and directly tying its impact on to the North African front. It is out of print, but if you can get a copy within you acceptable pain threshold on cost (because it WILL cost you), I would highly recommend it.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #44</b>

			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>

					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>

										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>

						</ul>

				data-frz-src="https://cf.geekdo-static.com/avatars/avatar_id107791.png"
				alt="Avatar"></a>
		</div>
	
		
			<div class='badgeyears'>
	<a href="/support"  class='js_badgelink'
		onmouseover="GAV_ShowBadge( this ); return overlib( 'This user supports the website - Click for more info.', WRAP );"
		onmouseout="return nd();">
	<span class='oddicon patron'></span><span class='oddicon year_10_band band' data-year='10'></span><span class='oddicon year_11_band band' data-year='11'></span><span class='oddicon year_12_band band' data-year='12'></span><span class='oddicon year_13_band band' data-year='13'></span><span class='oddicon year_14_num num last' data-year='14'></span>	</a>
</div>
		
	<div ><a href="/microbadge/1224"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Kansas State University', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_1224_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/14733"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Washington\&#039;s War fan ', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_14733_1.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/38935"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('&quot;I am not throwing away my shot!&quot;', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_38935_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/29834"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Mark Herman fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_29834_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/32496"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Michael Rinella Fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_32496_0.png"></a></div>
</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#35</span><br /><br />This game is the best application of the <a  href="/boardgame/3685/hammer-scots"   >Hammer of the Scots</a> system. The game is wide-open and because of that, it is a tight, but different every game. It also offers a naval aspect not found in many of these games.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #32</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>
		</dl>
		<dl>
							<dd class="doubleleft">
									<div id='recommendstatus_listitem5334640'>
	<dl class="recommend">
			<dt class='recs'><a href="/login">14</a>&nbsp;</dt>
	<dd class='thumbdd'><a href="/login">&nbsp;<img class="icon " src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" alt="Thumb up" title="Thumb up"></a></dd>

	<dd><a href="/login">&nbsp;<img class='icon i_coinsmall2' title='GeekGold Tip' alt='tip' style=''  src='data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==' /></a></dd>

			</a>

</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#34</span><br /><br />My all-time favorite filler game.  As the CIA or KGB, you use an agent to organize groups and forces to influence a battleground country.  The mechanic is blackjack: get close to a target number, but not over.  Cards have abilities, as do the agents.  It is a big challenge to guess and bluff your opponent.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #25</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>
		</dl>

					ng-click="loadMoreComments('next')">View More Comments {{limitCount(numnextitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}&nbsp;/&nbsp;{{numnextitems_calculated}}</span>

			<span class="fr"
				  ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>

				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',

				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',

				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>

				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>

			</span>

		</div>

			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">

					</dd>

					<dd class="left">

					</dd>

							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">

								</span>

							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>

	<div ><a href="/microbadge/1224"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Kansas State University', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_1224_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/14733"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Washington\&#039;s War fan ', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_14733_1.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/38935"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('&quot;I am not throwing away my shot!&quot;', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_38935_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/29834"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Mark Herman fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_29834_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/32496"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Michael Rinella Fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_32496_0.png"></a></div>
</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#32</span><br /><br />Mark Herman churns out masterpieces the way I churn out propaganda hype  about Mark Herman.  In 1994, he changed the way played wargames (<a  href="/boardgame/620/we-people"   >We the People</a>.  In 2015, he did it again.  I don't think it will be the next big genre: that honor goes to COIN.  I think it's because this system is too difficult to replicate, though Great One did just that (<a  href="/boardgame/199904/pericles-peloponnesian-wars"   >Pericles</a>).<br /><br />My knowledge of all things wargaming is hardly complete, but I can say this is the first game I have played that marries war and politics in a meaningful way.  And best of all, it's a 3-player game that doesn't involve playing "gang up on the leader" and where having the most victory points may very well be a bad thing.  It is cooperative-competitive on steroids.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: Not Ranked</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>
		</dl>

		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

			<span
					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

			<span class="fr" ng-show="showpager">
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

			<div class="clear"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="errorbox" ng-if="error">
			{{error.message}}
		</div>

		<div id='quickcomment_{{commentParams.objecttype}}_{{commentParams.objectid}}'></div>

		<div ng-hide="hidecomments">

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
							<li ng-if="comment.editdate_formatted">
								Edited <span ng-bind-html="comment.editdate_formatted"></span>
							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showDeleteControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button" ng-href="/comment/delete/{{comment.commentid}}">Delete</a>
									</li>
								</ul>
								<div class="clear"></div>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<div class='clear'></div>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="errorbox" ng-if="comment.error">{{comment.error.message}}</div>
				<div id='quickcomment_{{comment.objecttype}}_{{comment.objectid}}_{{comment.commentid}}'></div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="comment_toolbar" ng-show="showpager||numnextitems_calculated">
			<span
				ng-show="numnextitems_calculated"

	<div ><a href="/microbadge/1224"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Kansas State University', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_1224_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/14733"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Washington\&#039;s War fan ', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_14733_1.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/38935"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('&quot;I am not throwing away my shot!&quot;', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_38935_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/29834"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Mark Herman fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_29834_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/32496"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Michael Rinella Fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_32496_0.png"></a></div>
</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#31</span><br /><br />More simulation than game that is a true joy for the connoisseur of American Revolution history. I never thought the Trenton/Princeton campaign would be a fun topic to game until I played this game.  The high initial rating may be in part due to the newness of it and the shock and awe I got from the first time I played it.  It did create quite an impression on this Am. Rev. nerd.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: Not Ranked</b>

									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#30</span><br /><br />This is more game and less sim and like a Martin Wallace wargame, focuses on an interesting command mechanic, in this case, the friction of war, with an interesting Euroish command matrix.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #26</b>

		<div class='comment_toolbar'>
			<span class='status' ng-show="loading">Loading...</span>

			<span class='sf mr5 b'>
				<ng-pluralize count="data.config.numitems"
								  when="{'0':     'No Comments',
								         'one':   '1 Comment',
											'other': '{} Comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked"> | Locked</span>
			</span>

			<span ng-show="data.config.numitems > 0">
				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>
				<a ng-show="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = false">Show</a>
			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

			<span
				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',
					        'other': '{} previous comments'}">
				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

					class="comment_button"
					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
					ng-click="loadMoreComments('previous')">
						View Previous
							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>
				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageBackward( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">&laquo;</span>
				Pg. {{commentParams.pageid}}
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageForward( $event )">&raquo;</span>
				<span  ng-class="getCommentButtonClass()" ng-click="pageToLast( $event )">{{data.config.endpage}}</span>
			</span>

		</div>

			{{error.message}}

			<div id="comment{{comment.commentid}}"
				  ng-class="applyStyle( comment )"
				  ng-repeat="comment in data.comments"
				  ng-init="comment.visible = !comment.hidden && !comment.blocked">
				<a name="comment{{comment.commentid}}"></a>
				<dl class="commentbody" id="body_comment{{comment.commentid}}" ng-show="comment.visible">
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.avatar"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="right">
						<div class='article_subject sf' ng-if="0">
							<span ng-bind-html="data.config.objectlink"></span>
						</div>
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.body"></span>
					</dd>
				</dl>
				<dl>
					<dd class="left">
						<span ng-bind-html="comment.recommend"></span>
					</dd>
					<dd class="commands">
						<ul>
							<li id="objstatus_comment{{comment.commentid}}">
								<span ng-if="comment.hidden || comment.blocked">
									[<a ng-click="comment.visible = !comment.visible" ng-switch on="comment.visible"><span ng-switch-when="false">Show</span><span ng-switch-when="true">Hide</span><span ng-switch-default></span></a>]
								</span>
								<span ng-if="comment.thumbvalue==4" class="ml10">
									Thank you for helping us moderate the site. [<a href="/community_rules">Community Rules</a>]
								</span>
							</li>
						</ul>
						<ul class="information" id="controls_comment{{comment.commentid}}">

							</li>
							<li>
								<a ng-href="/{{comment.objecttype}}/{{comment.objectid}}?commentid={{comment.commentid}}#comment{{comment.commentid}}">Posted <span ng-bind-html="comment.postdate_formatted"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}">Reply</a>
									</li>
									<li>
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-quote="1">Quote</a>
									</li>
									<li ng-if="showEditControls( comment.userid )">
										<a class="comment_button js-quickcomment" data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}" data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}" data-commentid="{{comment.commentid}}" data-edit="1">Edit</a>

	<div ><a href="/microbadge/1224"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Kansas State University', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_1224_0.gif"></a><a href="/microbadge/14733"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Washington\&#039;s War fan ', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_14733_1.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/38935"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('&quot;I am not throwing away my shot!&quot;', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_38935_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/29834"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Mark Herman fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_29834_0.png"></a><a href="/microbadge/32496"><img alt='mb'  onmouseover="return overlib('Michael Rinella Fan', WRAP );" onmouseout="return nd();" title=''src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="onload="lzld(this)"onerror="lzld(this)"class='mbimg'data-frz-src="//cf.geekdo-static.com/mbs/mb_32496_0.png"></a></div>
</div>
</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#29</span><br /><br />Joe Miranda is a true innovator in wargaming.  Too often, though, I find his games lack proper development.  But when his games have proper development, you end up with something like this.<br /><br />I have plenty of Bulge games, but this one is unlike all of them.  You are the highest level of command, and as the Allies, you are trying to figure out what the Germans are up to.  If you over-commit your forces, you lose victory points.  You have to try to figure out what their objective is (hint: only a 1/3 chance that it is Antwerp), and then respond with the proper amount of force before it is too late.<br /><br />You select cards for your hand before your opponent plays.  Your cards will react to his move and then what is left will be used on your turn.  These cards will allow you to move, attack, gather intelligence, reorganize, replenish forces, and provide combat bonuses.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: #20</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>
		</dl>

				<a ng-hide="hidecomments" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="hidecomments = true">Hide</a>

			</span>

			<a ng-if="showadmincontrols" class="comment_button" ng-href="" ng-click="toggleLock()">
				<span ng-if="data.config.locked">Unlock</span>
				<span ng-if="!data.config.locked">Lock</span>
			</a>

			<a ng-if="showCommentButton()"
				class="comment_button js-quickcomment"
				data-objecttype="{{commentParams.objecttype}}"
				data-objectid="{{commentParams.objectid}}">Comment</a>

				ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"
				class='sf error'>
				&nbsp;<ng-pluralize count="numprevitems_calculated"
					when="{ 'one' : '1 previous comment',

				</ng-pluralize>&nbsp;
			</span>

					ng-show="numprevitems_calculated"

							{{limitCount(numprevitems_calculated,commentParams.showcount)}}
			</span>

				<span class="comment_button" ng-click="pageToFirst( $event )" ng-hide="commentParams.pageid==1">1</span>

							<li>
								<ul class="commands" ng-show="comment.visible">
									<li>

</dd>
						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#28</span><br /><br />I am not a big Napoleon-guy (hmmmm... is there irony in that statement?  You be the judge), but this is a very strong game.  Many folks think this is the best of Borg's Command and Colors-style games.  I cannot dispute this statement because it is a fine game, even if there are others that I prefer.  <br /><br />Decreasing dice with casualties, along with the combined arms and square rules are huge.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: Not Ranked</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>

						<dd class="doubleright">
									<span style="font-size: 24pt;">#27</span><br /><br />I have long struggled with this game. The rulebook sucks and I have twice re-wrote the sucker into a better layout and explanation. Solitaire games need sequential, not topical, rulebooks, because it makes it easier to reference while learning the game.<br /><br />I posted the rulebook in the Files section. With that, this is a tough game on Operation Silver Bayonet, where the Americans are protecting Pleiku and a pair of Special Forces bases with superior firepower and limited resources.  The AI does a really good job of simulating NVA tactics.  It's a one-of-a-kind system and should be experienced by those interested in the topic.<br /><br /><b>Last Year: Not Ranked</b>
								<div class='clear'></div>
			</dd>
		</dl>

	  class='comment_ctrl'
